definition: variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: Bezier Line in the Scene View.
sentences.chinese: 在场景视图的贝塞尔曲线。

sentences.english: Select a form or view in the database.
sentences.chinese: 在数据库中选择一个表单或视图。

sentences.english: In situations where you know you need thread safety, use a thread-safe view.
sentences.chinese: 在需要线程安全的情况下，请使用线程安全视图。

sentences.english: The example I've included with this post is view-first. The view is created, then the view model attached.
sentences.chinese: 本文中我使用的示例是视图优先模式。

sentences.english: FIG. 6 is a top view of an induction coil of the present invention.
sentences.chinese: 图六为本发明的一个感应线圈的侧视图。

sentences.english: Five a side football game with top view.
sentences.chinese: 旧风格的顶视图和快速的玩足球游戏。

sentences.english: Non-interactive items that are included in the control view cannot receive keyboard focus.
sentences.chinese: 控件视图中包括的非交互式项不能接收键盘焦点。

sentences.english: In a table-view row, to reveal the Delete button.
sentences.chinese: 在表视图行，以显示删除按钮。

sentences.english: Each list and view is uniquely identified with a GUID.
sentences.chinese: 每个列表和视图都通过GUID来唯一标识。

sentences.english: Specifies support for storing database or recordset objects in documents and views.
sentences.chinese: 指定支持在文档和视图中存储数据库或记录集对象。

sentences.english: To facilitate this task, BIRT provides the Data Explorer View.
sentences.chinese: BIRT提供了数据浏览视图以简化该任务。

sentences.english: A pageview indicates that a visitor has viewed a certain page on the website.
sentences.chinese: 页面视图意味着访问者已经浏览了网站上的一些页面。

sentences.english: Hitting "4" will pop up a sub-window allowing me to select a view.
sentences.chinese: 按一下“4”将弹出一个选择视图的子窗口。

sentences.english: A Content Package or Package describes a folder that is used to hold multiple perspectives.
sentences.chinese: 程序包或包是指一个用于保存多个透视图的文件夹。

sentences.english: Examine both black-box and white-box views for each level of abstraction addressed.
sentences.chinese: 为所描述的每个抽象层分析黑盒及白盒视图。

sentences.english: Steps for allowing the Query and View Designer to create a self-join.
sentences.chinese: 让查询和视图设计器创建自联接的步骤。

definition: a control (e.g. button, text box etc) (computing)
form (used in programming languages such as Visual Basic and Delphi to create a GUI window)
